urls.title: Hideo Kojima Rewrote Death Stranding 2 After the COVID-19 Pandemic - IGN
urls.description: To say the COVID-19 pandemic affected Hideo Kojima's writing of Death Stranding 2 would be an understatement.

tweets.text: Hideo Kojima said at #TheGameAwards that he "didn’t want to predict any more future" so he rewrote Death Stranding 2. The first games's themes of loneliness had some eerie parallels to the COVID-19 lockdown. https://t.co/0wBOsiMy2D https://t.co/m1Q5PWZUO7

🥺

#DS2 #DeathStranding2 https://t.co/KQPqaISDCb
@Kojima_Hideo https://t.co/QsLMk7oMlq

I'm looking forward to see a new masterpiece game by Hideo Kojima ❤️❤️❤️ @HIDEO_KOJIMA_EN @Kojima_Hideo @DeathStranding_
 #DS2 #DeathStranding2 #TheGameAwards #HideoKojima https://t.co/nc3T5pksne
@Kojima_Hideo Kojima & Keighly https://t.co/KiqduLOBkH

@Kojima_Hideo has done it again ❤️

https://t.co/o9ElTzYH7n

urls.title: Hideo Kojima Rewrote Death Stranding 2 After the COVID-19 Pandemic - IGN
urls.description: To say the COVID-19 pandemic affected Hideo Kojima's writing of Death Stranding 2 would be an understatement.

tweets.text:

urls.title: The Game Awards: 10-Year Celebration | Hollywood Bowl
urls.description: “The Game Awards: 10-Year Celebration,” a special live concert event with the Hollywood Bowl Orchestra, will feature orchestral music selections and suites from many of the world’s top video game franchises.Notify MeSign up to be notified when tickets go on sale in 2023.

tweets.text:
To celebrate 10 years of #TheGameAwards we are proud partner with the @LAPhil for The Game Awards: 10 Year Celebration, a special, one-night-only concert of video game music.

Sunday, June 25, 2023 at the @HollywoodBowl 

Sign up for first details: https://t.co/VH5klnc9uN https://t.co/DDP2pJdYKV
